Lying Lights.name: Lying Lights
Lying Lights.fullText:
Cunning Prevaricator Attack 11Lying Lights

As your allies strike the chosen foe, they vanish in clouds of glittering light.

Encounter        Arcane, Illusion, Implement, Radiant
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage. Each ally who hits the target before the end of your next turn becomes invisible until the end of his or her next turn. This invisibility ends if the ally makes an attack roll.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 18.
Lying Lights.flavor: As your allies strike the chosen foe, they vanish in clouds of glittering light.
Lying Lights.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage. Each ally who hits the target before the end of your next turn becomes invisible until the end of his or her next turn. This invisibility ends if the ally makes an attack roll.

Trickery's Reward.name: Trickery's Reward
Trickery's Reward.fullText:
Cunning Prevaricator Utility 12Trickery's Reward

With words of cunning wisdom, you guide your ally’s defenses, foiling your enemies’ attack one way or another.

Encounter        Arcane, Healing
Immediate Interrupt      Close burst 10

Trigger: An attack hits an ally within 10 squares of you

Target: The ally that was hit by the triggering attack

Effect: The target gains a bonus to all defenses that the triggering attack targets equal to your Intelligence modifier. If the triggering attack misses, the target gains the bonus to those defenses until the end of your next turn. If the triggering attack hits, the target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge.


Revision (10/13/2009)
In the Trigger line, replace “misses” with “hits”.
In the Target line, replace “missed” with “hit”.

Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 18.
Trickery's Reward.flavor: With words of cunning wisdom, you guide your ally’s defenses, foiling your enemies’ attack one way or another.
Trickery's Reward.trigger: An attack hits an ally within 10 squares of you
Trickery's Reward.target: The ally that was hit by the triggering attack
Trickery's Reward.effect: The target gains a bonus to all defenses that the triggering attack targets equal to your Intelligence modifier. If the triggering attack misses, the target gains the bonus to those defenses until the end of your next turn. If the triggering attack hits, the target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge.

Nimbus of Falsehood.name: Nimbus of Falsehood
Nimbus of Falsehood.fullText:
Cunning Prevaricator Attack 20Nimbus of Falsehood

You cast magical dust into your enemy’s face, blurring its vision and confounding its actions.

Daily        Arcane, Illusion, Implement, Psychic
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is affected by your nimbus of falsehood (save ends). While affected by the nimbus of falsehood, if the target misses with a melee attack, you can use an immediate interrupt to have the attack hit a different creature, including the target, within the attack’s range.

Miss: Half damage. If the target misses with a melee attack before the end of your next turn, you can use an immediate interrupt to have the attack hit a different creature, including the target, within the attack’s range.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 18.
Nimbus of Falsehood.flavor: You cast magical dust into your enemy’s face, blurring its vision and confounding its actions.
Nimbus of Falsehood.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is affected by your nimbus of falsehood (save ends). While affected by the nimbus of falsehood, if the target misses with a melee attack, you can use an immediate interrupt to have the attack hit a different creature, including the target, within the attack’s range.
Nimbus of Falsehood.onMiss: Half damage. If the target misses with a melee attack before the end of your next turn, you can use an immediate interrupt to have the attack hit a different creature, including the target, within the attack’s range.
